member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.DependencyResolverExtensions.UseServiceBus(Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.IDependencyResolver,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use Windows Azure Service Bus as the messaging backplane for scaling out of ASP.NET SignalR applications in a web farm.
member.param: The Service Bus connection string to use.
The topic prefix to use. Typically represents the app name. This must be consistent between all nodes in the web farm.
member.remarks: Note: Only Windows Azure Service Bus is supported. Service Bus for Windows Server (on-premise) is not supported.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.DependencyResolverExtensions.UseServiceBus(Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.IDependencyResolver,Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration)
member.summary: Use Windows Azure Service Bus as the messaging backplane for scaling out of ASP.NET SignalR applications in a web farm.
member.param: The Service Bus scale-out configuration options.
member.remarks: Note: Only Windows Azure Service Bus is supported. Service Bus for Windows Server (on-premise) is not supported.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Culture

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_ArgumentMustBeNonNegativeTimeoutVal

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_ArgumentMustBePositiveTimeoutVal

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data size is too big..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_IncorrectIAsyncResultProvidedToEndMethod
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An incorrect IAsyncResult was provided to an 'End' method. The IAsyncResult object passed to 'End' must be the one returned from the matching 'Begin' or passed to the callback provided to 'Begin'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_IncorrectImplOfIAsyncResult
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An incorrect implementation of the IAsyncResult interface. {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_IncorrectImplOfIAsyncResultReturningBadValues
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An incorrect implementation of the IAsyncResult interface ({0}) may be returning incorrect values from the CompletedSynchronously property or calling the AsyncCallback more than once..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_MultipleOperationException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The IAsyncResult implementation '{0}' tried to complete a single operation multiple times. This could be caused by an incorrect application IAsyncResult implementation or other extensibility code, such as an IAsyncResult that returns incorrect CompletedSynchronously values or invokes the AsyncCallback multiple times..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_OnlyOnceChecOrSyncPerOperation
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Only call Check/SyncContinue once per async operation (once per PrepareAsyncCompletion)..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_SemaphoreCountAlreadyReachedZero
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Semaphore's count has already reached zero before this operation. Make sure Exit() is called only after successfully entered the semaphore.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_UnableToResolveIncaseIndexOfRole
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to resolve the instance index of this role. Make sure Microsoft.WindowsAzure.ServiceRuntime.dll is deployed with your application..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.Resources.Error_ValueSuppliedMustBeBetween
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value supplied must be between {0} and {1}..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBus.ServiceBusMessageBus
member.summary: Uses Windows Azure Service Bus topics to scale-out SignalR applications in web farms.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration
member.summary: Settings for the Service Bus scale-out message bus implementation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration.ConnectionString
member.summary: The Service Bus connection string to use.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration.TopicPrefix
member.summary: The topic prefix to use. Typically represents the app name. This must be consistent between all nodes in the web farm.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration.TopicCount
member.summary: The number of topics to send messages over. Using more topics reduces contention and may increase throughput. This must be consistent between all nodes in the web farm. Defaults to 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.ServiceBusScaleoutConfiguration.TimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the messageâ€™s time to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to the Service Bus. Messages older than their TimeToLive value will expire and no longer be retained in the message store. Subscribers will be unable to receive expired messages.
